casename: Lim Chuan Huat and Another v Public Prosecutor
counsel: Peter Yap (Chor Pee & Partners) for the first appellant; Kertar Singh (Kertar & Co) for the second appellant; Daniel Yong (Deputy Public Prosecutor) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Criminal Law/Offences/Voluntarily causing hurt to maid/Appellants individually assaulting maid on various occasions/Whether assaults forming same transaction/Applicable tests/s 176 Criminal Procedure Code (Cap 68)

Criminal Procedure and Sentencing/Charge/Duplicity/Charge containing more than one distinct offence/Duplicity resulting from use of phrase 'various occasions'- Whether duplicity mere irregularity and curable/ss 159(1), 168 & 396 Criminal Procedure Code (Cap 68)

Criminal Procedure and Sentencing/Charge/Errors in charge/Particulars of charge/Ambiguity in use of phrase 'various occasions'/Whether errors material/Whether appellants misled by errors/ss 159(1) & 162 Criminal Procedure Code (Cap 68)
